newsitem.title: UK: Sainsbury up as Capel raises to "hold".
newsitem.headline: Sainsbury up as Capel raises to "hold".

text.p: Shares in J. Sainsbury Plc rose on Monday as analysts at HSBC James Capel raised the supermarket stock to "hold" from "sell," market sources said. The stock was up 4-1/2p at 366 by 1136 GMT, extending a rebound since it fell to a low of 341p on November 14 -- its lowest since January 1992.
Analyst Frank Davidson at Capel declined comment.
